Uses of Package
nl.fw.yapool

  • Packages that use nl.fw.yapool 
    Package Description
    nl.fw.yapool
    Yet Another Pool - a generic pool implementation
    nl.fw.yapool.listener  
    nl.fw.yapool.object  
    nl.fw.yapool.sql  
    nl.fw.yapool.sql.datasource  
  • Classes in nl.fw.yapool used by nl.fw.yapool 
    Class and Description
    BoundPool
    A LIFO pool that respects a minimum and maximum size.
    IPool
    Main interface for all pool implementations.
    IPoolEvents
    Generic interface for handling IPoolListeners and PoolEvents.
    IPoolFactory
    A factory for creating resources.
    IPoolListener
    Listener that can be added to a IPoolEvents registry to receive PoolEvents.
    Pool
    A LIFO pool that can be used to re-use resources.
    PoolEvent
    Event that is fired when a pool performs an action.
    PoolPruner
    A singleton pool-pruner that can prune multiple pools.
    PrunedPool
    A BoundPool that can actively remove idled and expired resources from the pool (see PrunedPool.prune()).
    PruneTask
    A default prune task that prunes a pool at regular intervals (uses PrunedPool.getPruneIntervalMs()).
  • Classes in nl.fw.yapool used by nl.fw.yapool.listener 
    Class and Description
    BoundPool
    A LIFO pool that respects a minimum and maximum size.
    IPoolListener
    Listener that can be added to a IPoolEvents registry to receive PoolEvents.
    Pool
    A LIFO pool that can be used to re-use resources.
    PoolEvent
    Event that is fired when a pool performs an action.
